name: Messy Jessie
description:
Your daughter got dumped today, and she is mad! Don't let her make a mess, or get near to you.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD/Arrow keys
  • Clean up - Spacebar

Credits:

  • Code, Level design, Sound fx - Mravec @MraveniskoDev
  • Graphics - Jahodovemliecko
  • Graphics - Kenney @KenneyNL (CC0)
  • Music - Bryan Teoh (CC0)
